content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (46.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Stone furnace at position (46.0, -82.0)
Use-case: Processes iron ore into iron plates. Recently, an additional 10 units of iron ore were inserted to re-feed the furnace, updating its inventory to include 16 units of iron ore and a current production reflecting only 2 iron plates in early iterations. Despite being fueled and operational (with reported fuel at 8 units of coal and furnace source indicating processing attempts), the furnace now faces extended timeouts due to insufficient smelting progress after re-supplying.

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing entities with insufficient inventory
- Verify that the required item exists in inventory before attempting to place the entity.

### Errors when operating furnaces without a continuous ingredient supply
- Provide a consistent feed of ore to prevent NO_INGREDIENTS warnings that disrupt the smelting process.

### Errors related to insufficient smelting production and timeouts
- Allow adequate processing time after re-feeding the furnace.
- Monitor the furnace’s operational parameters—fuel, inventory levels, and processing rate—to ensure sufficient production before timing out.
- Adjust waiting periods or refine re-supply procedures to mitigate timeouts in smelting production.
